title: Tour
description: A tour describes an amount of stops given an explicit stop order, containing all information about activities to be done, e.g. loading and unloading information about consignments or maintenance stops

CostsAndCharges.title: Costs and charges
CostsAndCharges.description: Used to transfer detailed information about the fees

EdiAdditionalLoadingEquipment.title: Additional loading equipment
EdiAdditionalLoadingEquipment.description: Additional loading aids which are not part of the consignment but which have been added to safely transport the goods

eurPallets.title: EPAL
eurPallets.description: EUR pallets as defined by European Pallet Association (EPAL)

eurBoxes.title: EUR box pallets
eurBoxes.description: EUR Box pallets as defined by European Pallet Association (EPAL)

countryCode.title: Country code of the address Use ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 codes.

additionalAddressLines.title: Additional address lines of the address

EdiAlreadyReceived.title: Already received as surplus consignment
EdiAlreadyReceived.description: The goods are already at the receiving partners warehouse, because they have been reported as surplus earlier on

surplusConsignmentNo.title: Surplus consignment no
surplusConsignmentNo.description: The reference number under which the surplus consignment had been reported by the receiving partner

shippingDate.title: Shipping date
shippingDate.description: The date of the manifest which contained the surplus goods

EdiAnonymity.title: Anonymity services
EdiAnonymity.description: Neutral addresses which are shown to the shipper or consignee in order to conceal the actual shipper or recipient of the goods

EdiArchive.title: Digital archive
EdiArchive.description: Functions provided by the digital archive systems

automaticDownloadOfPod.title: PoD push
automaticDownloadOfPod.description: The proof of delivery document is provided for automatic download

EdiBarcode.title: Bar codes / SSCC number
EdiBarcode.description: Detailed information about the individual handling units

code.title: Bar code / SSCC / NVE
code.description: Id of the handling unit, usually printed as machine readable bar code on the package

batch.title: Batch
batch.description: Information identifying the manufacturing batch of the goods in the unit

bestBefore.title: Best before
bestBefore.description: Information about the expiry of good

tariff.title: Tariff
tariff.description: Use to specify a special tariff to be used for freight calculation (e.g. heavy goods, ...)

deliveryTerms.title: Delivery terms
deliveryTerms.description: Use to specify under which terms the consignment is process and which legs are billed to whom

logisticModel.title: Logistic model
logisticModel.description: Used to active special billing and clearing conditions the partners have agreed on

data.title: Data bytes
data.description: The submitted data as base64 string, be aware large files > 100KByte should be submitted as fileReference

EdiCashOnDelivery.title: Cash on delivery
EdiCashOnDelivery.description: The goods must only be delivered if the recipient pays the given amount

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency of the given amount

acceptCash.title: acceptCash
acceptCash.description: Specifies if cash should be accepted (true) or rejected (false)

acceptCheque.title: acceptCheque
acceptCheque.description: Specifies if cheques should be accepted

EdiContent.title: Content
EdiContent.description: Describes the nature and quantity of the goods in this consignment

nonHazardousWaste.title: Non hazardous waste
nonHazardousWaste.description: The content has no value and is not dangerous

loadingAids.title: Loading aids
loadingAids.description: The consignment only consists of loading aids which are transported and does not contain real goods

packagingPool.title: Packaging pool
packagingPool.description: Name of the packaging pool which is used to handle to loading aids from this consignment

highValueGoods.title: High value goods
highValueGoods.description: This consignment contains goods of high value which are subject to higher insure fees and a higher risk of theft

loadingMeter.title: Loading meters (m)
loadingMeter.description: Length of the area occupied on a 2.4 m wide container

grossWeightKilogram.title: Gross weight (kg)
grossWeightKilogram.description: Weight of the consignment including all packaging

areaPalletBays.title: Pallet bays
areaPalletBays.description: Area used by the consignment in terms of standard EUR pallet bays (120 x 80 cm)

chargeableWeightKilogram.title: Chargeable weight (kg)
chargeableWeightKilogram.description: Virtual weight of the shipment used for billing purposes. Used to take the bulkiness of goods into account or to enforce minimums

emptyWeightKilogram.title: Empty weight (kg)
emptyWeightKilogram.description: Empty weight of the vehicle/shipment in kilogram

loadingWeightKilogram.title: Loading weight (kg)
loadingWeightKilogram.description: Maximal loading capacity of the vehicle in kilogram

totalWeightKilogram.title: Total weight (kg)
totalWeightKilogram.description: Total weight of the vehicle/shipment in kilogram

volumeLiter.title: Volume liter
volumeLiter.description: Volume liter of the consignment/position. Used for e.g. tank transportation

EdiContentCustomsInformation.title: Customs information
EdiContentCustomsInformation.description: Used to specifiy information necessary in the customs process

EdiCustomsInformation.title: Customs information
EdiCustomsInformation.description: Used to specify information necessary in the customs process

clearedForFreeTransitWithinEU.title: Cleared for free transit within EU

grossWeightKilogram.title: Gross weight (kg)
grossWeightKilogram.description: Weight of the consignment including all packaging

technicalNameIfNotOtherwiseSpecified.title: Technical name if not otherwise specified
technicalNameIfNotOtherwiseSpecified.description: The technical name if not otherwise specified

netExplosiveMassKilogram.title: Net explosive mass in kilogram
netExplosiveMassKilogram.description: The net explosive mass in kilogram

EdiDeliveryOptions.title: Delivery options
EdiDeliveryOptions.description: Requirements for special services or equipment for the delivery

liftingPlatform.title: Lifting Platform
liftingPlatform.description: The consignment can only be delivered with a vehicle equipped with a lifting platform

pointOfUseDelivery1Person.title: Point of use delivery - 1 man handling
pointOfUseDelivery1Person.description: The goods must be deliverd to the point of use with one man handling

pointOfUseDelivery2Persons.title: Point of use delivery - 2 men handling
pointOfUseDelivery2Persons.description: The goods must be deliverd to the point of use with two men handling

shelfService.title: Shelf service
shelfService.description: The goods must be put into the shelves at the destination

pickupByConsignee.title: Pick up by consignee
pickupByConsignee.description: The consignee will pick up the goods at the receiving partner's warehouse. Do not perform local delivery

deliveryOnlyWithDeliveryNote.title: Delivery only with delivery note
deliveryOnlyWithDeliveryNote.description: Delivery should only be performed with the delivery note

digitalDeliveryNote.title: Digital delivery note
digitalDeliveryNote.description: The delivery note has been sent by means of digital communication (and is not attached to the goods)

deliveryNoteOnGoods.title: Delivery note on goods
deliveryNoteOnGoods.description: The delivery note is attached to the goods

podOnOriginalDeliveryNote.title: PoD on original delivery note
podOnOriginalDeliveryNote.description: The recipient must sign the original delivery note as proof of delivery. The signed document must be returned to the shipping partner

returnOriginalDeliveryNote.title: Original delivery note must be returned as paper
returnOriginalDeliveryNote.description: Original delivery note must be returned with the signature of the recipient to the shipping partner as paper (i.e. not in electronic form)

deliveryWithoutReceiptAllowed.title: Delivery without receipt allowed
deliveryWithoutReceiptAllowed.description: The goods may be dropped at the designated location without a signature

forAttentionOf.title: For attention
forAttentionOf.description: The delivery is for attention of the given company

EdiDocumentReferences.title: References
EdiDocumentReferences.description: All references to the linked documents, systems and devices

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique id of the document

consignmentObjectId.title: Unique central consignment number
consignmentObjectId.description: Unique identification for the consignment in a central system

consignmentNoShippingPartner.title: Consignment number of the shipping partner
consignmentNoShippingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the shipping partner

consignmentNoReceivingPartner.title: Consignment number of the receiving partner
consignmentNoReceivingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the receiving partner

tourId.title: Tour Id
tourId.description: A unique identifier assigned to the tour by the devlivering company

stopId.title: Stop Id
stopId.description: Unique identifier for the stop within the tour

vehicleId.title: The vehicle id
vehicleId.description: The unique Id of the vehicle (Truck/Trailer/Train)

deviceId.title: Device Id
deviceId.description: The id of the used device

systemReferences.title: A reference to an IT system
systemReferences.description: A reference to an IT system like TMS, etc.

packageNo.title: Package number / Barcode of the package
packageNo.description: Unique identification for the package. This is often an SSCC / NVE barcode number

commissionNo.title: Commission Number
commissionNo.description: Commission number under which the commission is managed in the master data

deliveryNote.title: Delivery note
deliveryNote.description: The delivery note of the shipper which describes the content of this consignment

EdiDriver.title: Driver
EdiDriver.description: Information about the drivers of the vehicles

phoneNumber.title: Phone number
phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the driver

vehicleId.title: The vehicle id
vehicleId.description: The system wide id of the vehicle, the driver is connected

EdiEvening.title: Evening
EdiEvening.description: The consignment must be delivered in the evening hours

EdiExternalServices.title: External services
EdiExternalServices.description: Services that are not provided by the parties involved in the physical transport but by external service providers (e.g. central services by the networks)

EdiFileContent.title: File Content
EdiFileContent.description: Transfers file data like a picture, pdf, txt..

contentType.title: Content Type
contentType.description: The content type like application/pdf, image/png...

EdiFileReference.title: File Reference
EdiFileReference.description: Reference to a file in an online storage

absoluteUri.title: Absolute Uri
absoluteUri.description: An absolute URL to a file on the online storage

uriValidFrom.title: Uri Valid From
uriValidFrom.description: The URL is valid from date

uriValidTo.title: Uri Valid To
uriValidTo.description: The URL is valid until date

EdiFixedDay.title: Fixed day
EdiFixedDay.description: The consignment must be delivered at the given date (and in the given time window)

EdiFixedWeek.title: Fixed week
EdiFixedWeek.description: The consignment must be delivered within the given week of the year

weekOfYear.title: Week of the year for delivery / pickup

qualifierCode.title: Qualifier for a Category
qualifierCode.description: Category that the Content belongs to e.g. dangerous goods, special instructions, delivery condition

EdiGateway.title: Gateway-Options
EdiGateway.description: Special requirements for the handling of the goods at intermediate hubs / gateways

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The consignment must be processed with priority

EdiGeoPosition.title: Geo position
EdiGeoPosition.description: Data about the current geo position

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: North–south position of a point on the Earth's surface

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: East–west position of a point on the Earth's surface

placeName.title: Place name
placeName.description: The place name of the current geo position

w3WCoordinate.title: What3words coordinate
w3WCoordinate.description: A coordinate for the What3Words service like index.home.raft

recordTime.title: Record time
recordTime.description: Time the GPS record was created

angle.title: Angle
angle.description: The angle is the direction that the vehicle is moving in (Heading)

EdiGeoRadius.title: GeoRadius for the accuracy
EdiGeoRadius.description: GeoRadius that describes when a Position is considered as in range

radius.title: GeoRadius for the Coordinates
radius.description: GeoRadius that extends the range of the coordinates

radiusMeasurementUnitCode.title: Unit Code for GeoRadius
radiusMeasurementUnitCode.description: Code that describes the unit in which the radius is measured. Default kilometers (KMT)

EdiGeoSpeed.title: Speed
EdiGeoSpeed.description: The current speed of the vehicle

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: The current speed of the vehicle

speedMeasurementUnitCode.title: Unit Code for Speed
speedMeasurementUnitCode.description: Code that describes the unit in which the Speed is measured. Default kilometers (KMT)

EdiGpxFile.title: Gpx File Content
EdiGpxFile.description: Gpx File that contains checkpoints and a destination

EdiHandlingInstructions.title: Handling instructions
EdiHandlingInstructions.description: Handling instructions for the goods, e.g. to prevent damage

customsGoods.title: Customs Goods
customsGoods.description: The goods are subject to customs processing and must be processed according the rules of the local authorities

customsGoodsResubmissionDate.title: Customs Goods resubmission date
customsGoodsResubmissionDate.description: The resubmission date for the customs goods

handleWithCare.title: Handle with care
handleWithCare.description: The goods must be handeled with care to prevent damage

emptiesExchange.title: Empties exchange required
emptiesExchange.description: Specifies whether empties should be exchanged with the consignee

remarksInvoice.title: Invoice remarks
remarksInvoice.description: Free text information for the invoice

remarksPickup.title: Pickup remarks
remarksPickup.description: Free text information for the pick up

remarksDelivery.title: Delivery Remarks
remarksDelivery.description: Free text information for the delivery

EdiInsuranceValue.title: Insurance value
EdiInsuranceValue.description: Value of the goods, used for insurance purposes

EdiLine.title: Line
EdiLine.description: Lines are describing handling units of similar sizes and content for brevity

lineNo.title: Line no
lineNo.description: A ordinal number, ordering the line within the consignment/pickup order

handlingUnitCount.title: Handling unit count
handlingUnitCount.description: The number of the items in this consignment/pickup order which are handeled individually

handlingUnitType.title: Handling unit type
handlingUnitType.description: The type of packaging (e.g. pallet, carton box, ...) ouf the outer most packaging

innerPackageCount.title: Inner package count
innerPackageCount.description: Used to specify the number of inner packages (e.g. the number of boxes on a pallet)

innerPackageType.title: Inner package type
innerPackageType.description: The type of packaging of the inner packages

content.title: Content
content.description: A short description of the nature of the goods contained within the packages

refNo.title: Reference number
refNo.description: A reference of the ordering party relating to the goods

article.title: Article
article.description: Article number of the goods contained within the packages

loadingMeter.title: Loading meters (m)
loadingMeter.description: Length of the area occupied on a 2.4 m wide container

grossWeightKilogram.title: Gross weight (kg)
grossWeightKilogram.description: Weight of the consignment including all packaging

areaPalletBays.title: Pallet bays
areaPalletBays.description: Area used by the consignment in terms of standard EUR pallet bays (120 x 80 cm)

chargeableWeightKilogram.description: Virtual weight of the shipment used for billing purposes. Used to take the bulkiness of goods into account or to enforce minimums

emptyWeightKilogram.title: Empty weight (kg)
emptyWeightKilogram.description: Empty weight of the vehicle/shipment in kilogram

loadingWeightKilogram.title: Loading weight (kg)
loadingWeightKilogram.description: Maximal loading capacity of the vehicle in kilogram

totalWeightKilogram.title: Total weight (kg)
totalWeightKilogram.description: Total weight of the vehicle/shipment in kilogram

volumeLiter.title: Volume liter
volumeLiter.description: Volume liter of the consignment/position. Used for e.g. tank transportation

EdiLoadingOptions.title: Loading options
EdiLoadingOptions.description: Information about the loading of the main haul

directPickup.title: Direct pickup
directPickup.description: The goods picked up by the line haul and are not loaded by the shipping partners warehouse

EdiLoadUnit.title: Load units
EdiLoadUnit.description: Load units (containers, swap bodies, ...) used to transport the goods

identification.title: Identification
identification.description: Identification (e.g. registration number) of the unit

customLoadingUnitTypeName.title: Custom Loading Type Unit Name
customLoadingUnitTypeName.description: Custom Loading Unit Type Name, like specialContainers or trailer formats

loadingMeter.title: Loading meters (m)
loadingMeter.description: Length of the area occupied on a 2.4 m wide container

grossWeightKilogram.title: Gross weight (kg)
grossWeightKilogram.description: Weight of the consignment including all packaging

areaPalletBays.title: Pallet bays
areaPalletBays.description: Area used by the consignment in terms of standard EUR pallet bays (120 x 80 cm)

chargeableWeightKilogram.title: Chargeable weight (kg)
chargeableWeightKilogram.description: Virtual weight of the shipment used for billing purposes. Used to take the bulkiness of goods into account or to enforce minimums

emptyWeightKilogram.title: Empty weight (kg)
emptyWeightKilogram.description: Empty weight of the vehicle/shipment in kilogram

loadingWeightKilogram.title: Loading weight (kg)
loadingWeightKilogram.description: Maximal loading capacity of the vehicle in kilogram

totalWeightKilogram.title: Total weight (kg)
totalWeightKilogram.description: Total weight of the vehicle/shipment in kilogram

volumeLiter.title: Volume liter
volumeLiter.description: Volume liter of the consignment/position. Used for e.g. tank transportation

EdiMessageRouting.title: Routing information of the message
EdiMessageRouting.description: Routing information to identify the parties involved in the data transfer

partnerId.title: The PartnerId
partnerId.description: The partner which is sending the message to the receiving partner for further actions (e.g. 1234)

ediId.title: The Edi Id
ediId.description: The Edi Id is the technical sender or receiver (e.g. CONIZVK)

coniziId.title: The Conizi Id
coniziId.description: The conizi id for internal routing purposes

EdiMissingFromPreviousManifest.title: Missing from previous manifest
EdiMissingFromPreviousManifest.description: The goods for a consignment which already was part of another manifest and had been reported missing on that manifest

manifestId.title: Manifest id
manifestId.description: The manifest which first included the consignment

shippingDate.title: Shipping date
shippingDate.description: The date of the manifest which included the consignment

EdiNetwork.title: Network
EdiNetwork.description: The network under which rules the consignment should be processed

networkId.title: Name of the network
networkId.description: The name of the network. This is often identical to the name of the code list. Since the same code list may however be used outside the network, this field independently allows to specify the network

codelist.title: Name of the code list used
codelist.description: The name of the code list which specifies how the receiving system should interpret the codes used

product.title: Name of the product
product.description: The product allows to distinguish different processes within one network, effectively sub classing the network

EdiNextDay.title: Next day
EdiNextDay.description: The consignment must be delivered on the next working day

EdiNotAfter.title: Not after
EdiNotAfter.description: The consignment must be delivered until the given date

EdiNotBefore.title: Not Before
EdiNotBefore.description: The consignment must not be delivered before the given date

EdiNotifications.title: Notifications
EdiNotifications.description: Notifications which should be sent while processing the shipment, e.g. notifications about successful delivery, advance notifications, ...

EdiNotifyBeforePickupDeliver.title: Before pickup / deliver
EdiNotifyBeforePickupDeliver.description: Before a pickup or delivery is attempted the address noted here, should be contacted within the given time frame

leadTimeSecondsMinimum.title: Lead Time Seconds Minimum
leadTimeSecondsMinimum.description: Time frame begin for notification before delivery

leadTimeSecondsMaximum.title: Lead Time Seconds Maximum
leadTimeSecondsMaximum.description: Time frame end for notification before delivery

countryCode.title: Country code of the address Use ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 codes.

additionalAddressLines.title: Additional address lines of the address

EdiOrientation.title: Orientation
EdiOrientation.description: The goods must be transported in a given orientation and may not be flipped over

vertical.title: Upright
vertical.description: The goods must be transported upright

horizontal.title: Horizontal
horizontal.description: The goods must be transported flat down

barcode.title: Bar code / SSCC / NVE
barcode.description: Scan id of the package, usually printed as machine readable bar code on the package

weight.title: Weight of package (kg)
weight.description: Weight of the package in kg

correction.title: Correction
correction.description: Packaging correction for your Bordero from: ... (Additional description)

thirdPartyDelivery.title: Third Party Delivery
thirdPartyDelivery.description: Delivery of packaging by third parties on: ... (Additional description)

EdiPartnerIdentification.title: Fields to identify the partner
EdiPartnerIdentification.description: Routing information to identify the parties involved in the data transfer

countryCode.title: Country code of the address Use ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 codes.

additionalAddressLines.title: Additional address lines of the address

partnerId.title: The PartnerId
partnerId.description: The partner which is sending the message to the receiving partner for further actions (e.g. 1234)

ediId.title: The Edi Id
ediId.description: The Edi Id is the technical sender or receiver (e.g. CONIZVK)

coniziId.title: The Conizi Id
coniziId.description: The conizi id for internal routing purposes

EdiPickupOrder.title: Pickup order
EdiPickupOrder.description: Reference to a pickup order which resulted in this consignment

pickupOrderNo.title: Number of the Pickup order
pickupOrderNo.description: Number to the referenced pickup order

EdiPreBookedTimeslot.title: Pre booked time slot
EdiPreBookedTimeslot.description: A time slot has already been booked for the delivery of this consignment. Delivery must be attempted within this time slot

info.title: Info about pre booked time slot
info.description: Info about the pre booked time slot

EdiReferences.title: References
EdiReferences.description: Numbers of various sources identifing this consignment or references from this consignment to other business processes

deliveryNote.title: Delivery note
deliveryNote.description: The delivery note of the shipper which describes the content of this consignment

customerOrderNo.title: Customer order no
customerOrderNo.description: A reference of the shipper for this consignment

customerOrderDate.title: Customer order date
customerOrderDate.description: Date when the order was places with the shipping partner

orderEntrySystemReference.title: Order entry system reference
orderEntrySystemReference.description: A unique reference number from the system which was used to enter the order details

EdiReturnOfGoods.title: Return of goods
EdiReturnOfGoods.description: Services for the return of goods

emptyPackaging.title: Packaging disposal
emptyPackaging.description: The packaging of the goods is taken back and dispose

EdiReturnOfPreviousConsignment.title: Return of previous consignment
EdiReturnOfPreviousConsignment.description: Reference to another consignment which content is return using this consignment

consignmentNoShippingPartner.title: Consignment number of the consignment being returned
consignmentNoShippingPartner.description: The consignment number of the original consignment being returned

shippingDate.title: Shipping date
shippingDate.description: The date when the original shipment was forwarded

EdiRouting.title: Routing
EdiRouting.description: Information about the route take by this consignment/pickup order

EdiSameDay.title: Same day
EdiSameDay.description: The consignment must be delivered on the same day

EdiSameDayPickup.title: Same day pickup
EdiSameDayPickup.description: The goods must be picked up on the same day

EdiSeal.title: Seal
EdiSeal.description: Seals used to prevent tampering with the goods in the load unit

EdiSelfDisposal.title: Self Disposal
EdiSelfDisposal.description: Information for the driver to assign the tour to himself

groupName.title: Group Name
groupName.description: Name of the driver group, which is allowed to self-dispose the tour

EdiServices.title: Services
EdiServices.description: Special services which can be requested by the ordering party (or the shipping partner)

specialRun.title: Special Run
specialRun.description: The transport is produced via special run (and with special fares)

EdiStacking.title: Stacking
EdiStacking.description: Indicated whether the goods may or may not be stacked

forbidden.title: Stacking forbidden
forbidden.description: The goods must not be stacked

allowed.title: Stacking possible
allowed.description: Stacking of the goods is safely possible

EdiStandardText.title: Standard Text with parameters
EdiStandardText.description: Standard Text can be used to fill pre-defined text-snippets

contentCode.title: Code of the snippet
contentCode.description: Code for the specific snippet that shall be used for this standard Text e.g  001

filledText.title: Filled in snippet
filledText.description: Filled in snippet, if parameters can not be separated

parameters.title: Parameters for a snippet
parameters.description: Parameters that are filled in a pre-defined snippet. The Receiver has the snippet

EdiSubsequentDelivery.title: Subsequent Delivery
EdiSubsequentDelivery.description: Additional delivery to our Bordero from: ... (additional text) (Shipment-no. Of the dispatching and receiving partner are to be transferred additionally)

consignmentNoShippingPartner.title: Consignment number of the consignment for that the subsequent delivery is
consignmentNoShippingPartner.description: The consignment number of the original consignment

shippingDate.title: Shipping date
shippingDate.description: The date when the original shipment was forwarded

EdiTemperatureRestrictions.title: Temperature restrictions
EdiTemperatureRestrictions.description: Restrictions about the minimum and maximum temperature during the transport and special equipment to be used

temperatureMinCelsius.title: Minimum temperature (°C)
temperatureMinCelsius.description: The temperature must not drop below the given value during the transport

temperatureMaxCelsius.title: Maximum temperature (°C)
temperatureMaxCelsius.description: The temperature must not get greater than the given value

EdiTextInstruction.title: A Text instruction for the driver
EdiTextInstruction.description: A Text instruction for the driver

EdiTimeOptions.title: Time options
EdiTimeOptions.description: Requirements for the delivery or pickup time

EdiTimeSlotBooking.title: Time slot booking
EdiTimeSlotBooking.description: Information about time slots which need to be booked or are already booked for this consignment

EdiTimeSpan.title: Time span
EdiTimeSpan.description: The time span for an activity

EdiTourStop.title: Stop for delivering
EdiTourStop.description: Stop for delivering the actual goods

stopNo.title: Stop number
stopNo.description: The whole of the stop numbers in the right order defines the order of the stops

stopId.title: Stop Id
stopId.description: Unique identifier for this stop within the tour

EdiUnloadingOptions.title: Unloading Options
EdiUnloadingOptions.description: Information regarding unloading of the main haul

directDelivery.title: Direct delivery
directDelivery.description: The goods are to be delivered without unloading them at the receiving partners warehouse

EdiUseSpecificLastMileProvider.title: Specific last mile provider
EdiUseSpecificLastMileProvider.description: A given last mile provider must be used

name.title: Name of the provider
name.description: The name of the provider to be used

EdiVehicle.title: Vehicle
EdiVehicle.description: Information about the vehicles used in the transport

registration.title: Registration
registration.description: Official registration of the vehicle (e.g. license plate number)

isTrailer.title: Is a trailer
isTrailer.description: The vehicle is classified as trailer

sendTelematics.title: Vehicle sends telematics
sendTelematics.description: The vehicle sends telematics data to a central instance

deviceIds.title: Device Ids
deviceIds.description: List of device ids, are part of this vehicle

manufacturer.title: Device Ids
manufacturer.description: List of device ids, are part of this vehicle

EdiWeekendSaturday.title: Saturday
EdiWeekendSaturday.description: The consignment should be delivered on a saturday

EdiWorkRequest.title: Work request
EdiWorkRequest.description: The receiving partner should perform the action specified

info.title: Information
info.description: A description of the action to be performed

EdiYardInstruction.title: Instruction for the driver
EdiYardInstruction.description: Yard Instruction contains a Text Instruction and/or a Route with a gpx base64 file

urgency.title: Urgency Code
urgency.description: Urgency Code that can be set to signalize high/low priority. Default is normal

EdiYardNavigationInformation.title: Yard-Navigation
EdiYardNavigationInformation.description: A single Yard Navigation which contains either an instruction or a status

sequenceNumber.title: Position in the sequence
sequenceNumber.description: Number which defines the position in the sequence of the instructions/status

EdiYardStatus.title: Status
EdiYardStatus.description: Yard Status contains information that has so get sent back as part of a TourEvent

https://model.conizi.io/v1/transport/tru.title: Consignment
https://model.conizi.io/v1/transport/tru.description: A single consignment which is transferred between two partners. Usually used within the context a manifest

consignmentObjectId.title: Unique central consignment number
consignmentObjectId.description: Unique identification for the consignment in a central system

consignmentNoShippingPartner.title: Consignment number of the shipping partner
consignmentNoShippingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the shipping partner

consignmentNoReceivingPartner.title: Consignment number of the receiving partner
consignmentNoReceivingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the receiving partner

shippingDate.title: Shipping date
shippingDate.description: The date on which the consignment was forwarded to the receiving partner. If the consignment was part of a cargo manifest, this is the date on which the manifest was issued

manifestId.title: Manifest (Bordero) id of the shipping partner
manifestId.description: Unique identification for the manifest on which the shipment was loaded in the transport management system of the shipping partner

tourNumber.title: Tour number
tourNumber.description: Number of the planned / assigned local traffic tour for delivery

isPreAdvice.title: Is a pre advice
isPreAdvice.description: dds the possibility of sending the consignment (after saving, before approval) to e.g. a TMS

TourBookedTimeSlot.title: Booked Time Slots
